text: What are you doing, take your hand away~~

Hentai!
Guess what I'm going to say?

Just keep smiling~

Is it time to say goodbye?
Ugh QAQ, see you later...
Don't abandon me...
Can we meet again...
Humph, you will regret it !

seasons.text: New Year's Day is here. A new year has begun again. This year is {year}~
It's Valentine's Day again. Have you found your partner in {year}~
Today is Arbor Day, we must protect the environment!
Let me tell you a secret quietly~Today is April Fool's Day, don't be fooled~
Today is May 1st Labor Day. Have you planned where to go during your vacation~
It's Children's Day. Happy time is always short. It would be great if you never grow up...
Victory Day of the Chinese People's War of Resistance Against Japanese Aggression Remember the history, honor the martyrs, cherish peace and create the future.
Teacher's Day, you should say hello to your teachers at school~
National Day is here, celebrate the motherland’s birthday!
Who did you spend this year's Double Eleven with?
It's Christmas these days, and the owner must be doing some shopping again~

time.text: Good morning! The day's plan starts in the morning, and a wonderful day is about to begin~
Good morning! Good luck at work. Don't sit for too long and get up and move around more!
It's noon, I've been working all morning, and now it's lunch time!
It's easy to feel sleepy in the afternoon. Have you completed your exercise goal today?
It's evening! The sunset outside the window is very beautiful. The most beautiful thing is the red sunset~
Good evening, how are you today?

text: It's already so late, go to bed early, good night~
Take care of your eyes late at night!

time.text: Are you a night owl? You're still up so late, why don't you get up tomorrow?

default: Long time no see, life flies by so fast...
